title: Closed chest and cardiac massage
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cardiac resuscitation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Resuscitation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Emergency management
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Survival and emergency equipment
description: Episode of Series "Emergency Resuscitation". The techniques of closed chest cardiac massage is demonstrated by instructor, and by means of animated diagrams. The need for correct technique is stressed, when the method is used, accompanied by exhaled air resuscitation in cases of cardiac arrest and respiratory failure. The hazards of careless of misdirected application are explained.
